version_description:
New all-powerful SUPER GOLD rare card tier!!
New XP cards to max out your cards faster!
Special Chinese New Year theme added!
Fame cap increased to 100!
4th tier of achievements added!
Power Play difficulty improvements!
New all-powerful

New all-powerful SUPER GOLD rare card tier!!
New XP cards to max out your cards faster!
Special Chinese New Year theme added!
Fame cap increased to 100!
4th tier of achievements added!
Power Play difficulty improvements!
New all-powerful

New Daily Cups - beat 4 players a day to win prizes!
UI improvements
Fix for occasional text corruption in Asian languages
Bug fixes
PowerPlay frame rate improvements for low memory devices

New Daily Cups - beat 4 players a day to win prizes!
UI improvements
Fix for occasional text corruption in Asian languages
Bug fixes
PowerPlay frame rate improvements for low memory devices

- NEW Hall of Fame! Browse all the cards you've owned and get rewards!
- NEW Captain skills! Find unique players that give your team an edge!
- Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Polish, Greek and Ukrainian added to languages!
- Bug fixes

- NEW Buzzer Shot Power Plays! Make the shot to clinch the match!
- Better XP card rewards for winning power plays!
- Bug fixes

- NEW VIP feature with perks!

- DAILY CUP revamp - get GOLD for EVERY match you win!
- NEW Friend Point Stor
